content: the red maple leaf has been the national symbol of canada since the beginning of the eighteenth century of course you can also crochet it in autumn colors for a nice fall accent use them as a garland as shown or as coasters video tutorial 1 video tutorial left-hand 2 1 http //www redheart com/learn/videos/crochet-maple-leaf 2 http //www redheart com/learn/videos/left-hand-crochet-maple-leaf
